subject: DECTalk Express driver
body:
Hello folks:  For those of you waiting on a working DECTalk Express
driver for 2.6.20 and above I checked in a redesigned driver this
afternoon.  It does not have read all mode and I won't work on
reinstating that until we have the git repository speakup version
working correctly.

  Kirk

-- 

Kirk Reiser				The Computer Braille Facility
e-mail: kirk@braille.uwo.ca		University of Western Ontario
phone: (519) 661-3061
